title: Render parallel y-axes with labels
description:
D3-based axis rendering:
- Draw vertical axis lines at calculated x positions
- Render tick marks and labels using D3 axis
- Display attribute name labels above/below axes
- Support dynamic number of axes based on data

title: Create D3 scale utilities for axis rendering
description:
Implement D3 scale setup:
- Linear scales for each y-axis based on attribute range
- Position scale for x-axis spacing of parallel axes
- Utility functions to map domain values to SVG coordinates
- Responsive scaling based on container dimensions

title: Core Chart Infrastructure
description: Foundation layer: TypeScript interfaces, D3 scales, Vue3 component setup, SVG rendering of axes and polylines.

title: Implement Optimize for Solutions button action
description:
Optimize action:
- Trigger optimization calculation on button click
- Highlight top N plots as 'Solutions'
- Emit selectionChange with solution IDs
- Visual distinction for solution plots (e.g., thicker lines)

title: Build Vue 3 Component
close_reason: Implemented parallel plot chart component with Vue 3, D3, TypeScript. Created composables (useColorScale, useFilterLogic, useParallelPlotBrush, useParallelPlotRenderer, useParallelPlotScales), components (ParallelPlotContainer, ParallelPlotChart, ParallelPlotControls), and robot example harness.

title: Implement Optimization Mode - Top N selection
description:
Optimization feature:
- Number input for specifying N (top solutions count)
- Algorithm to rank plots by maximizing values across attributes
- Support configurable optimization strategy (sum, weighted, Pareto)
- Display only top N plots at full opacity

title: Implement Filter by Named Range control
description:
Named range filter:
- Button to filter by specific named range (e.g., 'Green')
- Automatically set brushes on all axes to match named range bounds
- Handle axes that don't have the named range defined
- Visual feedback showing range-based filter is active

title: Apply visual opacity states for filtered plots
description:
Visual feedback:
- Full opacity for plots passing filter
- Reduced opacity (ghosted) for plots failing filter
- Smooth opacity transitions on filter change
- Configurable opacity values via props

title: Create Robot Renderer component
description:
Robot visualization:
- Grid/card layout showing robot icons/representations
- Display robot ID and key attributes
- Support filtered state (show/hide or dim based on filter)
- Handle hover/click for selection

title: Implement external selection prop handling
description:
External selection input:
- Watch externalSelection prop for changes
- Highlight selected domain object's plot
- Handle clearing external selection
- Graceful handling of invalid/missing IDs

title: Implement Vue3 ParallelPlot component skeleton
description:
Create base Vue3 component using Composition API:
- Define props interface (data, axes, ranges, externalSelection)
- Set up reactive state management
- Create SVG container with responsive sizing
- Implement resize observer for container dimensions
- Define emit events (filterChange, selectionChange, requestSelectionChange)

title: Implement Clear All Filters control
description:
Clear functionality:
- Button component to clear all active brushes
- Reset all plots to full opacity
- Emit filterChange event with empty filter state
- Programmatically clear D3 brush selections

title: Implement filter logic for brush selections
description:
Filter computation:
- Determine which plots pass through brush range on axis
- Support single axis filtering
- Maintain filtered/unfiltered state per plot
- Reactive updates when brush changes

title: Integrate ParallelPlot with Robot Renderer
description:
Integration demo:
- Wire filterChange events to Robot Renderer filtering
- Wire selectionChange for bidirectional selection sync
- Test external selection from Robot card to chart
- Demonstrate full 2-way binding workflow

title: Define TypeScript interfaces for Domain Objects and Attributes
description:
Create core type definitions:
- DomainObject interface with id, label, and attribute values map
- Attribute interface with name, min, max values
- AxisConfig interface for axis configuration
- Range interface with name, min, max, color/style
- PlotData type combining domain object with visual state

title: Global Controls
description: Control buttons: Clear All Filters, Filter by Named Range, Optimization Mode with Top N selection.

title: Create demo application page
description:
Demo app:
- Vue3 page with ParallelPlot and Robot Renderer
- Control panel showing current filter state
- Documentation/instructions for usage
- Performance testing with large robot datasets

title: External Control & Events
description: 2-way binding support: external selection handling, event emission for filter/selection changes, conflict resolution between internal and external state.

title: Render polyline Plots for Domain Objects
description:
Plot visualization:
- Generate SVG path for each domain object
- Connect attribute values across all y-axes as polyline
- Apply distinct colors per plot (from data or generated)
- Support hover interactions for plot identification
- Implement smooth line interpolation option

title: Render Range bars on axes
description:
Visual range indicators:
- Draw colored rectangular bars alongside each axis
- Position bars according to range min/max values
- Support multiple ranges per axis (RED, AMBER, GREEN)
- Apply configurable styling (colors, opacity, width)

title: Create Robot domain model and sample data generator
description:
Robot data:
- Define Robot interface with numerical attributes (value2, value3, value4, value5)
- Create sample data generator for N robots with random attribute values
- Define RED/AMBER/GREEN ranges for each attribute
- Export as reusable test fixtures

title: Example Harness - Robot Demo
description: Testing harness using Robots as domain objects with attribute visualization and synchronized Robot Renderer component.

title: Implement D3 brush on individual axes
description:
Brush interaction:
- Add D3 brush behavior to each y-axis
- Allow click-drag to create brush selection
- Visual brush overlay with distinct styling
- Handle brush start/move/end events
- Store brush extent (min/max values) in component state

title: Handle conflict resolution between internal and external state
description:
State management:
- Define precedence rules for internal vs external state
- Clear/override conflicting brushes when external selection applied
- Restore brush state when external selection cleared
- Prevent infinite update loops in 2-way binding

title: Implement SelectionChange and RequestSelectionChange events
description:
Selection events:
- Emit selectionChange when internal selection changes
- Emit requestSelectionChange for 2-way sync requests
- Handle click-to-select on plot lines
- Include selected plot ID(s) in event payload

title: Implement composite AND filtering across multiple brushes
description:
Multi-brush filtering:
- Track active brushes across all axes
- Apply AND logic: plot must pass ALL active brushes
- Efficient recomputation when any brush changes
- Handle edge cases (no brushes = all pass)

title: Implement FilterChange event emission
description:
Event output:
- Emit filterChange when any brush is created/modified/removed
- Include current filter state (all active brushes with ranges)
- Include list of IDs of plots passing filter
- Debounce during brush drag for performance

title: Parallel Plot Chart - Vue3/D3/TypeScript Component
description: Build a reusable parallel coordinates chart component using Vue3 Composition API, D3, and TypeScript. The chart visualizes domain objects as polylines across multiple y-axes with interactive filtering, range visualization, and external control capabilities.

title: Interactive Filtering System
description: Brush-based filtering: create/modify/remove brushes on axes, composite AND filtering across multiple axes, visual opacity states for filtered/unfiltered plots.
